channel.title: Honkai: Star Rail on
channel.description: Recent content in Honkai: Star Rail on

item.title: Anti-Cheat
item.description: Basic explanation # The game uses AntiCheatExpert (ACE), which is not natively supported on Linux and is designed for Windows. There is a Windows compatibility layer known as Wine which is designed to allow software written for Windows to run on Linux. But even with Wine, ACE does not work. The only way to get the game to run is to run it without ACE and use some workarounds and tricks to mimic ACE’s behaviour.

item.title: Launchers
